nodes.beat: In modern-day Transylvania, Jonathan Harker, a real estate agent, is invited to Castle Dracula to finalize a property deal.
Dracula, a charismatic yet mysterious man, shows interest in the bustling city life of London.
Harker, feeling uneasy, discovers that Dracula is a vampire.
Harker escapes the castle and warns his fianc√©e, Mina, about Dracula.
Dracula moves to London, causing a series of mysterious illnesses.
Van Helsing, a vampire hunter, is called to investigate.
Van Helsing identifies Dracula as the cause and rallies a team to hunt him.
The team manages to corner Dracula and drive a stake through his heart.
Dracula disintegrates into dust, and peace returns to London.
Dracula, fascinated by technology, wishes to learn about the internet.
Dracula moves to London and creates a dark web empire, causing cyber chaos.
Lucy, a cybersecurity expert, is hired to track the source.
Lucy identifies Dracula as the culprit and teams up with Van Helsing.
They manage to infiltrate Dracula's network and shut it down.
Dracula, unable to cope with the loss of his power, fades into oblivion.
Mina, a journalist, travels to Transylvania to investigate a series of strange events at Castle Dracula.
Mina discovers that Dracula is a vampire and escapes the castle.
Mina warns her friend Lucy about Dracula.
Dracula, intrigued by the concept of social media, wishes to create a profile.
Dracula moves to London and becomes a social media sensation, spreading fear.
Van Helsing, now a TV show host, identifies Dracula's influence and rallies his audience to resist.
They manage to expose Dracula's true identity, leading to his social downfall.
Dracula, ostracized and powerless, vanishes into the digital ether.
Dracula, curious about modern medicine, expresses a desire to visit a hospital.
Dracula moves to London and infiltrates a hospital, causing a health crisis.
Van Helsing, a renowned doctor, identifies the cause and organizes a medical team.
They manage to corner Dracula and use a scientific method to neutralize him.
Dracula, unable to survive without his powers, fades into dust.
